## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.INTERACT" property

Emitted when a player interacts with the entity by clicking or tapping it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.INTERACT]: {
        entity: Entity;
        player: Player;
        raycastHit?: RaycastHit;
    };
```
